name: Measure
description: Measures the distance between multiple tokens.  The distance between eachselected token will be shown in the units of measure for the current page.Alternatively, multiple token ids can be specified as arguments to the commandto see the distance between those tokens.**Note:** Because of a bug in Roll20, the distance between selected and`@{target}` indicated tokens can not be measured.## Commands```!measure [token_id token_id [token_id ...]]```This will display the distance between all the selected tokens, or all thetokens whose token_ids are specified.  Measurements will be provided betweenall provided tokens in the units of the current page.Duplicate IDs are ignored.  An example for measuring the distance betweentokens players don't control:```!measure @{target|first|token_id} @{target|second|token_id}@{target|third|token_id} @{target|fourth|token_id}```To measure between only two tokens, the second token can be clicked for thetwo additional `@{target}` commands and a single distance will be provided.
